PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must prevent the escape of amplifiable material into the testing area.
SR Description: While in use within the SPM, the STC shall remain sealed
When the TC is sealed, the TC shall be air-tight and leak-proof
The TC shall provide a non-reversible seal to enclose sample after it is loaded

PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must achieve an analytical sensitivity ≥ 80%.
NAATOS TB V1 must achieve an analytical specificity ≥ 98%.
SR Description: When the TC is tested with samples that contain non-MTBC microorganisms, the TC shall return true negative results below 10^6 non-MTBC genomes/reaction

PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must achieve a clinical sensitivity ≥ 80%.
NAATOS TB V1 must achieve a clinical specificity ≥ 98%.
